trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the page is processed asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否异步处理页。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the page is in asynchronous mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />;
trans-unit.target: 如果页处于异步模式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsAsync%2A> property to determine whether the Web page is running in asynchronous mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsAsync%2A>属性来确定是否异步模式中运行网页。

trans-unit.source: This information is useful if controls or code on the page need to modify their behavior depending on whether the page is asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: 此信息很有用，如果控件或页面上的代码需要修改其行为，具体取决于页是异步。

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Operations](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/asynchronous-operations.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步操作](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/asynchronous-operations.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the page request is the result of a callback.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示页请求是否是回调的结果。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the page request is the result of a callback; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果页请求是回调的结果，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Implementing Client Callbacks Without Postbacks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[实现客户端回调而无需回发](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185)。

trans-unit.source: The string key of the client script to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的客户端脚本的字符串关键字。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the client script block with the specified key is registered with the page.
trans-unit.target: 确定具有指定关键字的客户端脚本块是否已向页注册。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the script block is registered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果注册了该脚本块，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Call this method before calling <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to avoid unnecessarily assembling the client-side script.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法之前调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>以避免不必要地将客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: This is particularly important if the script requires a large amount of server resources to create.
trans-unit.target: 这一点特别重要，如果该脚本需要大量服务器资源进行创建。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsClientScriptBlockRegistered%2A> method has been deprecated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsClientScriptBlockRegistered%2A> 方法已弃用。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.IsClientScriptBlockRegistered%2A> method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.IsClientScriptBlockRegistered%2A>中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A> method in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsClientScriptBlockRegistered%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A>方法结合<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsClientScriptBlockRegistered%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the ECMAScript written in the code declaration block has not already been registered, as determined by <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsClientScriptBlockRegistered%2A>, then a <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A> call is made.
trans-unit.target: 如果编写的代码声明块中 ECMAScript 不已注册，所确定的那样<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsClientScriptBlockRegistered%2A>，则<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterClientScriptBlock%2A>进行调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the page is involved in a cross-page postback.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示跨页回发中是否涉及该页。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the page is participating in a cross-page request; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该页参与跨页请求，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides two mechanisms for transferring control from one page to another.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供了两种用于将从一页的控制转移到另一个机制。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> method to transfer processing between pages, or you can make a cross-page request by assigning a page URL to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.PostBackUrl%2A> property of a button control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>方法处理传输之间页，也可以进行的跨页面请求分配的页 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.PostBackUrl%2A>按钮控件实现的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>接口。

trans-unit.source: In either case, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreviousPage%2A> page property will contain an object that represents the previous or originator page.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreviousPage%2A>页属性将包含表示上一页或发起方的对象。

trans-unit.source: If, for example, Page A posts to Page B, Page A's <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsCrossPagePostBack%2A> property (accessible through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreviousPage%2A> property) will be `true` and Page B's <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreviousPage%2A> property will have the name of Page A.
trans-unit.target: 如果页 A 例如，发送至页 B，页 A<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsCrossPagePostBack%2A>属性 (可通过访问<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreviousPage%2A>属性) 将`true`和页 B<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreviousPage%2A>属性将具有页 A 的名称

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the page is being rendered for the first time or is being loaded in response to a postback.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示页是第一次呈现还是为了响应回发而加载。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the page is being loaded in response to a client postback; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果是为响应客户端回发而加载该页，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For an explanation of the difference between postbacks and callbacks, see [Implementing Client Callbacks Without Postbacks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185).
trans-unit.target: 回发和回调之间的差异的说明，请参阅[实现客户端回调而无需回发](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to test the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A> property when the page is loaded in order to determine whether the page is being rendered for the first time or is responding to a postback.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何测试的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A>属性以确定是否页呈现第一次，或响应的回发加载页面时。

trans-unit.source: If the page is being rendered for the first time, the code calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果首次呈现页，该代码调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The page markup (not shown) contains <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> controls that display asterisks if no entry is made for a required input field.
trans-unit.target: （未显示） 的页标记包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>显示星号，如果没有条目专为必填的输入字段的控件。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> causes the asterisks to be displayed immediately when the page is rendered, instead of waiting until the user clicks the Submit button.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>会导致立即当呈现页，而不是等待直到用户单击提交按钮显示星号。

trans-unit.source: After a postback, you do not have to call <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, because that method is called as part of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 回发之后, 你无需调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，因为该方法调用的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>生命周期。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control in the page that performs postbacks has been registered.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示页中执行回发的控件是否经过注册。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control has been registered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该控件经过注册，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> object can be reused.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 对象是否可重用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The string key of the startup script to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的启动脚本的字符串关键字。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the client startup script is registered with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 确定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 对象是否注册了客户端启动脚本。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the startup script is registered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果注册了启动脚本，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Call this method before calling <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterStartupScript%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to avoid unnecessarily assembling the client-side script.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法之前调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterStartupScript%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>以避免不必要地将客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: This is particularly important if the script requires a large amount of server resources to create.
trans-unit.target: 这一点特别重要，如果该脚本需要大量服务器资源进行创建。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsStartupScriptRegistered%2A> method has been deprecated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsStartupScriptRegistered%2A> 方法已弃用。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.IsStartupScriptRegistered%2A> method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.IsStartupScriptRegistered%2A>中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterStartupScript%2A> method in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsStartupScriptRegistered%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterStartupScript%2A>方法结合<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsStartupScriptRegistered%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the ECMAScript written in the code declaration block has not already been registered, as determined by <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsStartupScriptRegistered%2A>, then a <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterStartupScript%2A> call is made.
trans-unit.target: 如果编写的代码声明块中 ECMAScript 不已注册，所确定的那样<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsStartupScriptRegistered%2A>，则<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterStartupScript%2A>进行调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether page validation succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示页验证是否成功。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if page validation succeeded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果页验证成功，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For this property to return `true`, all validation server controls in the current validation group must validate successfully.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回`true`，当前的验证组中的所有验证服务器控件都必须都验证成功。

trans-unit.source: You should check this property only after you have called the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, or set the `CausesValidation` property to `true` in the `OnServerClick` event handler for an ASP.NET server control that initiates form processing.
trans-unit.target: 只有具有调用之后，应检查此属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法或一组`CausesValidation`属性`true`中`OnServerClick`启动窗体处理的 ASP.NET 服务器控件的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: These server controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> classes.
trans-unit.target: 这些服务器控件包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>类。

trans-unit.source: If you force validation of a validation group using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A> method, then all validation controls in the specified validation group must validate successfully as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果强制验证的验证组使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A>方法，则指定的验证组中的所有验证控件必须成功验证以及。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A> property to set up a conditional statement.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A>属性设置的条件语句。

trans-unit.source: If the property returns `true`, the `Text` property of the `lblOutput` control is set to "Page is valid!"
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性返回`true`、`Text`属性`lblOutput`控件设置为"页无效 ！"

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is set to "Some of the required fields are empty."
trans-unit.target: 否则，设置为"的某些必填字段为空。"

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid" /> property is called before validation has occurred.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid" /> 属性在发生验证之前调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of objects stored in the page context.
trans-unit.target: 获取存储在页上下文中的对象的列表。

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> containing objects stored in the page context.
trans-unit.target: 对包含存储在页上下文中的对象的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> 的引用。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Items%2A> property to store objects with the same lifetime as the page request.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Items%2A>属性来存储为页面请求具有相同的生存期的对象。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can add objects to the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，你可以将对象添加到<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: Objects added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Items%2A> property are available throughout the lifetime of the page, so you can add objects to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Items%2A> property in events early in the page life cycle and access those objects in later events.
trans-unit.target: 添加到对象<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Items%2A>属性都的整个生存期内页上，提供的因此你可以将对象添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Items%2A>尽早中的页生存期的事件的属性进行循环，并访问更高版本的事件中的那些对象。

trans-unit.source: Sets the locale identifier for the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" /> object associated with the page.
trans-unit.target: 设置与页关联的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" /> 对象的区域设置标识符。

trans-unit.source: The locale identifier to pass to the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" />.
trans-unit.target: 要传递给 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" /> 的区域设置标识符。

trans-unit.source: In most circumstances, do not set this property in code.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，不要在代码中设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: The `LCID` attribute can be set in the directive of the .aspx file, however, the preferred method of setting the locale identifier is through the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Culture%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.UICulture%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: `LCID`可以在.aspx 文件指令中设置属性，但是，设置的区域设置标识符的首选的方法是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Culture%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.UICulture%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs at the end of the load stage of the page's life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 在页生命周期的加载阶段结束时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.LoadComplete> event occurs after all postback data and view-state data is loaded into the page and after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnLoad%2A> method has been called for all controls on the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.LoadComplete>事件发生后所有回发数据和视图状态数据加载到页和之后<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnLoad%2A>已为页面上的所有控件调用方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Loads any saved view-state information to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 将所有保存的视图状态信息加载到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The saved view state.
trans-unit.target: 保存的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.LoadPageStateFromPersistenceMedium%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.Load%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister?displayProperty=nameWithType> object referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PageStatePersister%2A> property to load any saved view-state information for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.LoadPageStateFromPersistenceMedium%2A>方法使用<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister.Load%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister?displayProperty=nameWithType>所引用对象<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PageStatePersister%2A>属性加载任何保存的视图状态信息<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>对象。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET includes two descendents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister> class that saves state information in a hidden field included in the ASP.NET page, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister> class that saves state in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Session%2A> object associated with the request.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 包括两个子代的<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>类，<xref:System.Web.UI.HiddenFieldPageStatePersister>将状态信息保存在 ASP.NET 页中包含的隐藏字段的类和<xref:System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister>中保存状态的类<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Session%2A>与关联的对象请求。

trans-unit.source: To save state in the location of your choice, you should create a new descendent of the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> class that saves and loads state to the persistence medium of your choice.
trans-unit.target: 若要将状态保存在你选择的位置，你应创建一个新的派生<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>类，该类将保存并加载到持久性介质的所选的状态。

trans-unit.source: For an example of creating a new <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> object, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关创建新的示例<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>对象，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>类。

trans-unit.source: If you are using the .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, override this method if you want to load the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> state from anything other than a hidden field.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用的.NET Framework 版本 1.0 或 1.1，重写此方法，如果你想要加载<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>状态从隐藏的字段之外的任何内容。

trans-unit.source: If you choose to do so, you must also override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SavePageStateToPersistenceMedium%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你选择这样做，则还必须重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SavePageStateToPersistenceMedium%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to return the user to the same position in the client browser after postback.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在回发后将用户返回到客户端浏览器中的同一位置。

trans-unit.source: This property replaces the obsolete <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.SmartNavigation" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性替换已过时的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.SmartNavigation" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the client position should be maintained; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应保持客户端位置，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When Web pages are posted back to the server, the user is returned to the top of the page.
trans-unit.target: 当网页是回发到服务器，则用户将返回到页面顶部。

trans-unit.source: On long Web pages, this means that the user has to scroll the page back to the last position on the page.
trans-unit.target: 在较长的网页，这意味着，用户必须向下滚动页面回发到页面上的最后一个位置。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MaintainScrollPositionOnPostBack%2A> property is set to `true`, the user is instead returned to the last position on the page.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MaintainScrollPositionOnPostBack%2A>属性设置为`true`，则用户将改为返回到最后一个位置的页上。

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MaintainScrollPositionOnPostBack%2A> property in the [@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4) directive.
trans-unit.target: 你设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MaintainScrollPositionOnPostBack%2A>中的属性[@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4)指令。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the virtual path.
trans-unit.target: 表示虚拟路径的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the physical path that a virtual path, either absolute or relative, or an application-relative path maps to.
trans-unit.target: 检索虚拟路径（绝对的或相对的）或应用程序相关的路径映射到的物理路径。

trans-unit.source: The physical path associated with the virtual path or application-relative path.
trans-unit.target: 与虚拟路径或应用程序相关的路径关联的物理路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MapPath%2A> property can potentially contain sensitive information about the hosting environment.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MapPath%2A>属性可能包含敏感信息有关的宿主环境。

trans-unit.source: The return value should not be displayed to users.
trans-unit.target: 返回值不应该向用户显示。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MapPath%2A> method to obtain the physical path of a subfolder.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MapPath%2A>方法来获取子文件夹的物理路径。

trans-unit.source: It then appends the file name that is read from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 然后，将从读取的文件名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.Text%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The result is the absolute physical path to that file.
trans-unit.target: 结果是对该文件的绝对物理路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets the master page that determines the overall look of the page.
trans-unit.target: 获取确定页的整体外观的母版页。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MasterPage" /> associated with this page if it exists; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在，则为与此页相关联的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MasterPage" />；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Master%2A> property returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.MasterPage> object associated with this page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Master%2A>属性返回<xref:System.Web.UI.MasterPage>对象关联的这一页。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set properties on the <xref:System.Web.UI.MasterPage> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，你可以设置属性<xref:System.Web.UI.MasterPage>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Master%2A> property is valid only on pages that reference a master page in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MasterPageFile%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Master%2A>属性是仅在引用中的主控页的页上有效<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MasterPageFile%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Master%2A> property on a page that does not reference a master page, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果你访问<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Master%2A>不引用母板页的页面上的属性`null`返回。

trans-unit.source: The contents of a master page are not available until after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit> event has been raised.
trans-unit.target: 母版页的内容不可用，直到后<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the virtual path of the master page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置母版页的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path of the master page.
trans-unit.target: 母版页面的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MasterPageFile%2A> property is a virtual path (from the root of the application) of the master page file associated with this page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MasterPageFile%2A>属性是虚拟路径 （从应用程序的根目录） 关联的这一页的母版页文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MasterPageFile%2A> property can be set only in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit> event; attempting to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MasterPageFile%2A> property after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit> event will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MasterPageFile%2A>属性可以设置仅在<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit>事件; 正在尝试设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MasterPageFile%2A>属性后的<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit>事件将引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MasterPageFile%2A> property is not valid, an exception of type <xref:System.Web.HttpException> is thrown later in the page life cycle, but no exception is thrown when the property is set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MasterPageFile%2A>属性不是有效，类型的异常<xref:System.Web.HttpException>引发更高版本中页的生命周期，但不会引发异常时在该属性设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit>事件。

trans-unit.source: Pages that have the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MasterPageFile%2A> property set are content pages, and therefore can contain only top-level controls that are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content> controls.
trans-unit.target: 页具有<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MasterPageFile%2A>属性组是否内容页中，并因此可包含仅顶级控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.MasterPageFile" /> property is set after the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit" /> event is complete.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.MasterPageFile" /> 属性在 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Page.PreInit" /> 事件完成后进行设置。

trans-unit.source: The file specified in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.MasterPageFile" /> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.MasterPageFile" /> 属性中指定的文件不存在。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The page does not have a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content" /> control as the top level control.
trans-unit.target: 页中没有作为顶级控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Content" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum length for the page's state field.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置页状态字段的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: The maximum length, in bytes, for the page's state field.
trans-unit.target: 页的状态字段的最大长度（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 -1。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MaxPageStateFieldLength%2A> property is set to a positive number, the view state sent to the client browser is broken into multiple hidden fields, and each field's value is less than the size specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MaxPageStateFieldLength%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MaxPageStateFieldLength%2A>属性设置为正数、 发送到客户端浏览器的视图状态分为多个隐藏的字段，以及每个字段的值小于中指定的大小<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MaxPageStateFieldLength%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MaxPageStateFieldLength%2A> property to a negative number (the default) indicates that the view-state field should not be separated into chunks.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MaxPageStateFieldLength%2A>为负数 （默认值） 的属性指示不应该将视图状态字段分隔成多个块。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MaxPageStateFieldLength%2A> to a small number may result in poor performance.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MaxPageStateFieldLength%2A>为数量较少可能会导致性能不佳。

trans-unit.source: Set the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MaxPageStateFieldLength%2A> property in the of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MaxPageStateFieldLength%2A>属性中的的 Web.config 文件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.MaxPageStateFieldLength" /> property is not equal to -1 or a positive number.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.MaxPageStateFieldLength" /> 属性不等于 -1 或正数。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.MaxPageStateFieldLength" /> property was set after the page was initialized.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.MaxPageStateFieldLength" /> 属性是在初始化页后设置的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content of the "description" <see langword="meta" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置“描述”<see langword="meta" /> 元素的内容。

trans-unit.source: The content of the "description" <see langword="meta" /> element.
trans-unit.target: “描述”<see langword="meta" /> 元素的内容。

trans-unit.source: HTML `meta` elements can be used to improve search-engine listings.
trans-unit.target: HTML`meta`元素可用于提高搜索引擎列表。

trans-unit.source: The "description" `meta` element is used by some search engines to improve listing previews.
trans-unit.target: "Description"`meta`某些搜索引擎使用元素来改善列表预览。

trans-unit.source: If there is no "description" `meta` element in the `head` element of the page markup, the `meta` element is added to the page when the page is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有"描述"`meta`中的元素`head`的页标记中，元素`meta`呈现页时，将元素添加到页面。

trans-unit.source: If the page markup already has a "description" `meta` element, this property gets or sets the `content` attribute of the `meta` element.
trans-unit.target: 如果页面标记已有"description"`meta`元素，此属性获取或设置`content`属性`meta`元素。

trans-unit.source: You can also set this property in the directive.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以在指令中设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MetaDescription%2A> property of a page to "ASP.NET Overview", the following element will appear in the rendered HTML:
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MetaDescription%2A>到"ASP.NET 概述"页的属性，下面的元素将出现在呈现的 HTML:

trans-unit.source: The page does not have a header control (a <see langword="head" /> element with the <see langword="runat" /> attribute set to "server").
trans-unit.target: 页面没有标题控件（<see langword="head" /> 特性设置为“server”的 <see langword="runat" /> 元素）

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content of the "keywords" <see langword="meta" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置“关键字”<see langword="meta" /> 元素的内容。

trans-unit.source: The content of the "keywords" <see langword="meta" /> element.
trans-unit.target: “关键字”<see langword="meta" /> 元素的内容。

trans-unit.source: HTML `meta` elements can be used to improve search-engine listings.
trans-unit.target: HTML`meta`元素可用于提高搜索引擎列表。

trans-unit.source: The "keywords" `meta` element is either not used at all or is given very little weight by the major search engines.
trans-unit.target: "关键字"`meta`元素根本或者不使用或由主要的搜索引擎提供很少的权重。

trans-unit.source: If there is no "keywords" `meta` element in the `head` element of the page markup, the `meta` element is added to the page when the page is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有任何"关键字"`meta`中的元素`head`的页标记中，元素`meta`呈现页时，将元素添加到页面。

trans-unit.source: If the page markup already has a "keywords" `meta` element, this property gets or sets the `content` attribute of the `meta` element.
trans-unit.target: 如果页面标记已有"关键字"`meta`元素，此属性获取或设置`content`属性`meta`元素。

trans-unit.source: You can also set this property in the directive.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以在指令中设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MetaKeywords%2A> property of a page to "HTML,CSS,XML,JavaScript", the following element will appear in the rendered HTML:
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.MetaKeywords%2A>"HTML、 CSS、 XML，JavaScript"页的属性，下面的元素将出现在呈现的 HTML:

trans-unit.source: The page does not have a header control (a <see langword="head" /> element with the <see langword="runat" /> attribute set to "server").
trans-unit.target: 页面没有标题控件（<see langword="head" /> 特性设置为“server”的 <see langword="runat" /> 元素）

trans-unit.source: Gets the model binding execution context.
trans-unit.target: 获取模型绑定器的执行上下文。

trans-unit.source: The model binding execution context.
trans-unit.target: 模型绑定器执行上下文。

trans-unit.source: If the model binding execution context is <see langword="null" />, a new one is created and returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果模型绑定的执行上下文是 <see langword="null" />，则声称一个新的模型绑定上下文并将其返回。

trans-unit.source: Gets the model state dictionary object that contains the state of the model and of model-binding validation.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含模型状态和模型绑定验证状态的模型状态字典对象。

trans-unit.source: The model state dictionary object.
trans-unit.target: 模型状态字典对象。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> event to initialize the page.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> 事件以对页进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnInit%2A> method performs the initialization and setup steps required to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnInit%2A>方法执行创建所需的初始化和安装步骤<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>实例。

trans-unit.source: In this stage of the page's life cycle, declared server controls on the page are initialized to their default state; however, the view state of each control is not yet populated.
trans-unit.target: 在此阶段中的页面的生命周期，该页上声明的服务器控件初始化为其默认状态;但是，将不填充每个控件的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: A control on the page cannot access other server controls on the page during the `Page_Init` phase, regardless of whether the other controls are child or parent controls.
trans-unit.target: 页上的控件无法访问期间页上的其他服务器控件`Page_Init`阶段，而不考虑其他控件是否子项或父控件。

trans-unit.source: Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access.
trans-unit.target: 不保证其他服务器控件都可创建并准备好进行访问。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnInit%2A> method is called after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnPreInit%2A> method and before the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnInitComplete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnInit%2A>方法后，会调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnPreInit%2A>方法和之前<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnInitComplete%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnInit%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnInit%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Page.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Page.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Page.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Page.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Page.InitComplete" /> event after page initialization.
trans-unit.target: 在页初始化后引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Page.InitComplete" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnInitComplete%2A> method is called after page initialization is complete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.OnInitComplete%2A>页初始化完成后调用方法。

trans-unit.source: In this stage of the page's life cycle, all declared controls on the page are initialized, but the page's view state is not yet populated.
trans-unit.target: 在此阶段的页面的生命周期中，所有声明的页上的控件进行初始化，但尚未填充页面的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: You can access server controls, but they will not yet contain information returned from the user.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问服务器控件，但它们将不包含从用户返回的信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the adapter that renders the page for the specific requesting browser.
trans-unit.target: 获取为特定的请求浏览器呈现页的适配器。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter" /> that renders the page.
